title: California Fires Force Thousands to Evacuate
text:
Fires in Northern and Southern California, driven by gusty winds and low humidity, are threatening thousands of people and homes across the state, as utilities continued mandatory blackouts.

Just north of Los Angeles, the Tick Fire began Thursday afternoon near the Santa Clarita Valley and quickly grew 3,950 acres. Mandatory evacuation orders were in place for 50,000 residents, and the sudden spread of the fire led to people fleeing with whatever they could grab. At least six structures have been destroyed so far, officials...
description: Fires in Northern and Southern California, driven by gusty winds and low humidity, are threatening thousands of people and homes across the state, as utilities continued mandatory blackouts.
